name: Rin
description: A brave and stubborn young merchant girl
story: A brave and sturdy young girl, Rin was adopted by the great merchant Basar following the loss of her father, though she refuses to believe he is truly dead. She is full of ambition, but also good-natured with a strong sense of justice.

relations.description: Rin hopes to one day be strong enough to fight the Unknown like Aramintha.
Basar adopted and took care of Rin after her real father died. She will forever be thankful to him, but has trouble conveying those feelings.
So close she's like a sister to her, Rin feels able to tell Silk absolutely anything.

specialty.name: Cat's Eyes
specialty.description: Her cat eyes glow in the darkness.

type.name: Fear
type.description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.

skills.name: Ring Throw
skills.description: Throws rings at the enemy, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff, and increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Showtime
skills.description: Heals all allies with an elegant dance, granting one random buff for 3 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.
skills.soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
skills.enhanced_description: Heals all allies with an elegant dance, granting two random buffs for 3 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

buffs.name: Random Buff
buffs.effect: Increase Attack (Greater), Increase Critical Hit Chance, Increase Critical Hit Damage, Increase Defense, Continuous Healing, Increase Evasion, Immunity

ex_equip.name: Rin's Sparkling Rings
ex_equip.description: A pair of rings Basar gave Rin on her first birthday after he adopted her. They never lose their sheen, and they're much lighter than her other rings.

skills.description: Increases chance of activating Ring Throw by 20% when using Dazzling Dance.
skills.skill_description: Dazzles the enemy with a dance, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, before a 70% chance to use Ring Throw. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.description: Amount recovered is increased by 15% when using Showtime.
Dispels one debuff from all allies before the skill effect when using Showtime.
skills.skill_description: Dispels 1 debuff from all allies and heals them with an elegant dance, before granting two random buffs for 3 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

skill1.name: 輪撃
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、75%の確率で強化効果を1つ解除する。更に自身のアクションゲージを15%UPさせる。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: 悪戯の舞
skill2.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、50.0%の確率で防御力DOWNを2ターンの間付与する。50%の確率で【輪撃】を発動する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill3.name: ショータイム
skill3.desc: 味方全体の生命力を回復し、ランダム強化効果を3ターンの間付与する。対象の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。
skill3.soul_description: 味方全体の生命力を回復し、ランダム強化効果を3ターンの間付与する。対象の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。
